text: Mohamed Salleh bin Abas (25 August 1929 â€“ 16 January 2021) was a Malaysian politician and lawyer. He was Lord President of the Supreme Court of Malaysia from 1984 to 1988.Tun Dato Haji Mohamed Salleh Bin Abas v Tan Sri Dato Abdul Hamid Bin Omar & Ors 1988 [SC] From 1999 to 2004, he was a member of the Terengganu State Legislative Assembly. Abas was a member of the Malaysian Islamic Party. Abas died on 16 January 2021 at a hospital in Kuala Terengganu, Malaysia from COVID-19 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Malaysian politicians Category:Malaysian lawyers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Malaysia Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Terengganu
title: Salleh Abas
